name: Climb Out
desc: This cable pit is not deep, I can climb out.

name: Street
desc: The ad. board has been moved and there appears a small gap which is just enough for a man to walk through.

name: Storeroom
desc: There is a door in the convenient store with a name {wSTOREROOM{n on it.

name: Gift Shop
desc: There is a gift shop across the street. Its windows are all broken.

name: Street
desc: Leave the gift shop, back to the street.

name: Photo Studio
desc: This is a photo studio. There used to be a long line waiting for taking photos with cartoon characters. Now there is no one in it.

name: Street
desc: Leave the photo studio, back to the street.

name: Printing Room
desc: There is a small printing room on the back of the photo studio's hall

name: Gate
desc: Go to the gate of the park.
